meta_description: Art, Culture, Community - There is something for everyone at Morris Museum from Exhibits to Live Events. Fun for the whole family.
hours_text:
Whether you’re planning a family expedition, a date, or a solo adventure, the Morris Museum has a range of unique offerings, including groundbreaking exhibitions, educational programs, live performances, and more.

[ General Admission ](https://morr-internet.choicecrm.net/ChoiceCRM.NET/templates/MORR/#/events) [ Become a Member ](/membership)

##  Tickets 

General Admission

$ 12

[Museum Members](https://morrismuseum.org/membership)

FREE

Seniors, students under 25 with ID, ages 3-17

$ 8

Children 2 and under **and** active military personnel + 5 family members

FREE

Group Discounts (10 adult guests or more)

$10

**Holiday Closures** : New Year’s Day, Martin Luther King Jr. Day, Presidents’ Day, Memorial Day, Independence Day, Labor Day, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Eve, and Christmas Day.

accessibility_text:
## 

#### Wheelchair Access

Each public space is accessible by elevators or ramps. There are a limited number of wheelchairs for use by visitors. Please request a wheelchair at the admissions desk.

#### Service Animals

Service animals are allowed throughout the museum.

#### The Bickford Theatre

Assistive listening devices are available at the front desk on the day of the performance.
